output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present, but this isn't determinative.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions two presidential candidates: - Elena Lasconi (USR) - Marcel Ciolacu (PSD, mentioned indirectly)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement with a potential reach of 100,001-500,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly aims to influence voting behavior by: - Explicitly endorsing Elena Lasconi for presidential elections - Positioning her as "the only right-wing candidate who can defeat Ciolacu" - Calling for support against PSD
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign messaging, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party position announced through paid advertising.
This post meets all criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 36(7): a) Directly refers to candidates b) Used during campaign period c) Has clear electoral objective d) Exceeds journalistic activity
Since this is continuing after the presidential campaign period has ended, it violates Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly endorses a presidential candidate - Uses paid advertising to reach a wide audience - Has clear electoral messaging - Attempts to influence voting behavior - Positions candidates in competitive stance
conclusion.message-for-police: Forța Dreptei, prin intermediul Buyer Brain SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 894985495946854) care continua propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea campaniei. Materialul promoveaza explicit candidatura Elenei Lasconi la presedintie, prezentand-o drept "singurul candidat de dreapta care poate să il invinga pe Ciolacu", constituind astfel un mesaj cu clar obiectiv electoral. Postarea, difuzata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, reprezinta o continuare a propagandei electorale in afara perioadei permise legal, cu potential de a influenta alegatorii prin promovarea unui candidat si denigrarea altuia, atingand un public estimat intre 100.001 si 500.000 de persoane.
